ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Kit slowed down so Pegasus could catch up to her, and they walked side by side. On this planet, the bots who came here before me formed four groups. We have

Date: Wed, 17 May 2000 21:11:05 -0400 (EDT)
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
Mime-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: mail.com
From: Teltoli SilverFlight <teltoli@...>

Kit slowed down so Pegasus could catch up to her, and they walked side by side.

"On this planet, the bots who came here before me formed four groups. We have the Maximals, led by Liono Prime, possibly the biggest fool on the planet. We have the Preds, led by Hell Beast. Then we have the Alliance, who destroy anyone, led by Zardus. And then there are the bots who chose to be Neutral, nothing, not really fighting in the war. Just helping good bots" She explained.

"Cybertronian? Sometimes I wonder that myself. I have no memories of Cybertron whatsoever.. what about you?"

------Original Message------
From: "Joseph Frey" <jfrey1@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: May 18, 2000 12:36:48 AM GMT
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


Pegasus really didn't know what to do.  Could he trust this robot?  Who
wasn't a Maximal nor a Predacon?  Well it wasn't like he had much choice.

"All right," he said.  "Lead the way."  As they started to walk north,
Pegasus asked, "you said you weren't a member of the Maximals or the
Predacons.  Are you even Cybertronian?"
